title: The Expenditure Approach to Calculating GDP

content.question: Macroeconomic Variables Values (in billions of dollars) Consumption Spending 13 Employee Compensation (Wages) 12 Government Spending 3 Interest Payments 1 Investment Spending 4 Net Exports <math alttext="negative 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> Profit 5 Calculate Country X’s nominal gross domestic product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>GDP</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for 2017 using the expenditures approach.
